mapper.select: SELECT NA.NM_ARTICLE_CODE AS NM_ARTICLE_CODE, S.S_CATEGORY_NAME AS S_CATEGORY_NAME, NA.NM_SUBJECT AS NM_SUBJECT , NA.NM_PRICE AS NM_PRICE, TO_CHAR(NA.NM_WRITE_D,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NM_WRITE_D , TO_CHAR(B.BOOK_START_D, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOOK_START_D, TO_CHAR(B.BOOK_END_D,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOOK_END_D FROM TBL_NM_ARTICLE NA,TBL_S_CATEGORY S, TBL_BOOK B WHERE NA.USER_CODE =#{user_code} AND NA.S_CATEGORY=S.S_CATEGORY_CODE AND NA.NM_ARTICLE_CODE = B.NM_ARTICLE_CODE ORDER BY NM_ARTICLE_CODE DESC
